languages.text: {n}Канцлер выглядит удивленной.{/n} "Ну что вы, Ваша Светлость! Конечно, мы с губернатором не близкие товарищи, однако я уважаю его вклад в развитие протектората и благодарна за заботу о Даргонусе".

{n}She looks surprised.{/n} "Why, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never! Of course, the governor and I are not exactly close friends, but I respect his contribution to the protectorate's development, and I'm thankful for his concern for Dargonus."
languages.original_text: {n}Канцлер выглядит удивленной.{/n} "Ну что вы, Ваша Светлость! Конечно, мы с губернатором не близкие товарищи, однако я уважаю его вклад в развитие протектората и благодарна за заботу о Даргонусе".

traits.locale_text: {n}She looks surprised.{/n} "Why, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never! Of course, the governor and I are not exactly close friends, but I respect his contribution to the trade empire's development, and I'm thankful for his concern for Dargonus."

{n}She looks surprised.{/n} "Why, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never! Of course, the governor and I are not exactly close friends, but I respect his contribution to the trade empire's development, and I'm thankful for his concern for Dargonus."

{n}She looks surprised.{/n} "Why, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never! Of course, the governor and I are not exactly close friends, but I respect his contribution to the trade empire's development, and I'm thankful for his concern for Dargonus."

{n}She looks surprised.{/n} "Why, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never! Of course, the governor and I are not exactly close friends, but I respect his contribution to the trade empire's development, and I'm thankful for his concern for Dargonus."

{n}She looks surprised.{/n} "Why, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never! Of course, the governor and I are not exactly close friends, but I respect his contribution to the protectorate's development, and I'm thankful for his concern for Dargonus."

languages.text: {n}她看起来很惊讶。{/n}“怎么会这样呢，大人？我绝不会！当然，总督与我并不是什么亲密的朋友，但我尊重他为王朝发展做出的贡献，也很感谢他为达戈努斯的付出。”
languages.original_text: {n}She looks surprised.{/n} "Why, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never! Of course, the governor and I are not exactly close friends, but I respect his contribution to the protectorate's development, and I'm thankful for his concern for Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}她看起来很惊讶。{/n}“怎么会这样呢，大人？我绝不会！当然，总督与我并不是什么亲密的朋友，但我尊重他为王朝发展做出的贡献，也很感谢他为达戈努斯的付出。”

languages.text: {n}Parece sorprendida.{/n} «¡En absoluto, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Es cierto que el gobernador y yo no somos precisamente íntimos amigos, pero respeto su contribución al desarrollo del protectorado y agradezco su preocupación por Dargonus».
languages.original_text: {n}She looks surprised.{/n} "Why, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never! Of course, the governor and I are not exactly close friends, but I respect his contribution to the protectorate's development, and I'm thankful for his concern for Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Parece sorprendida.{/n} «¡En absoluto, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Es cierto que el gobernador y yo no somos precisamente íntimos amigos, pero respeto su contribución al desarrollo del protectorado y agradezco su preocupación por Dargonus».

languages.text: {n}彼女は驚いているようだ。{/n}「まあ、陛下、とんでもございません！総督とは確かに親しい友人とは言い難いですが、保護領の開発に対する彼の貢献を尊敬していますし、ダルゴナスの発展に尽力していることも感謝しています」
languages.original_text: {n}She looks surprised.{/n} "Why, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never! Of course, the governor and I are not exactly close friends, but I respect his contribution to the protectorate's development, and I'm thankful for his concern for Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は驚いているようだ。{/n}「まあ、陛下、とんでもございません！総督とは確かに親しい友人とは言い難いですが、保護領の開発に対する彼の貢献を尊敬していますし、ダルゴナスの発展に尽力していることも感謝しています」

languages.text: {n}Sie wirkt überrascht.{/n} "Oh, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, niemals! Natürlich sind der Gouverneur und ich nicht gerade eng befreundet, aber ich respektiere seinen Beitrag zur Weiterentwicklung des Protektorats und bin dankbar für seine Bemühungen für Dargonus."
languages.original_text: {n}She looks surprised.{/n} "Why, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never! Of course, the governor and I are not exactly close friends, but I respect his contribution to the protectorate's development, and I'm thankful for his concern for Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie wirkt überrascht.{/n} "Oh, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, niemals! Natürlich sind der Gouverneur und ich nicht gerade eng befreundet, aber ich respektiere seinen Beitrag zur Weiterentwicklung des Protektorats und bin dankbar für seine Bemühungen für Dargonus."

languages.text: {n}Elle semble surprise.{/n} « Comment, Votre Seigneurie ? Jamais je n'oserais ! Bien entendu, le gouverneur et moi ne sommes pas des amis intimes, mais j'ai le plus grand respect pour la contribution qu'il apporte au développement du protectorat, et je lui suis reconnaissante de ses préoccupations au sujet de Dargonus. »
languages.original_text: {n}She looks surprised.{/n} "Why, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never! Of course, the governor and I are not exactly close friends, but I respect his contribution to the protectorate's development, and I'm thankful for his concern for Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle semble surprise.{/n} « Comment, Votre Seigneurie ? Jamais je n'oserais ! Bien entendu, le gouverneur et moi ne sommes pas des amis intimes, mais j'ai le plus grand respect pour la contribution qu'il apporte au développement du protectorat, et je lui suis reconnaissante de ses préoccupations au sujet de Dargonus. »

languages.text: {n}Clementia, şaşkına dönmüş gibi duruyor.{/n} "Nasıl yani {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Hayır tabii ki! Elbette valiyle yakın arkadaş sayılmayız ama protektoranın gelişimine olan katkılarına saygım büyük. Hakeza Dargonus için duyduğu endişelere de."
languages.original_text: {n}She looks surprised.{/n} "Why, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I would never! Of course, the governor and I are not exactly close friends, but I respect his contribution to the protectorate's development, and I'm thankful for his concern for Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia, şaşkına dönmüş gibi duruyor.{/n} "Nasıl yani {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Hayır tabii ki! Elbette valiyle yakın arkadaş sayılmayız ama protektoranın gelişimine olan katkılarına saygım büyük. Hakeza Dargonus için duyduğu endişelere de."
